name: Clockwork Soldier
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The soldier is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Intimidating Legions
text: A single clockwork soldier's rigid movements appear silly, but, when gathered in numbers, they become an inhuman terror. When the clockwork soldier makes a Charisma (Intimidation) check, it gains a bonus on that check equal to the number of other clockwork soldiers the target can see or hear.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Halberd
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Overdrive Flurry (Recharge 6)
text: The soldier makes four halberd attacks. After taking this action, it is stunned until the end of its next turn.
